name: Mangia!
description:
Sabrina must survive an onslaught of delicious Italian meals! How long can she last?

This is a project I started in 2019 and finally released after having it shelved for many months. It's directly based on an old Atari game of the same name. I hope you enjoy it!

Note: The maximum bonus level is 10, and the current bonus level is saved between playthroughs if you return to the title screen.
